title: Cholecystokinin receptor type A are involved in the circadian rhythm of the mouse retina

Author(s): Yusuke Yamakawa, Yuya Tsurudome, Masaki Tamada, Yuki Tsuchimochi, Yuya Umeda, Yuya Yoshida, Daisuke Kobayashi, Takehiro Kawashiri, Toshio Kubota, Naoya Matsunaga, Takao Shimazoe
